column4: Hey, I have a driver for my sound card "Creative X-FI" but I cant install it, it fails every time, can anyone help?

Well, I put the commands in (i'm afraid I only got ubuntu this morning) so I have no clue on code, but someone helped me for a while and it then said, after it worked on the terminal, that the installation failed.
until you tells us what you did exactly and give us the exact output no one can help you
and we do not support creative software. ask creative. it's THEIR software
